section.p: You are crossing the western wilderness, an expanse of wild, sparsely-populated countryside. A few trappers and woodsmen make a living from the natural resources of the area.

A tall spire of rock, a towering anomaly of geology, rises up into the clouds, dominating the horizon. A local hunter tells you it is known as Devil’s Peak and that the summit is infested with demons.

choices.choice: Head north into the Forest of Larun
